param.name: guidObject
param.para: A reference to the GUID used to identify the object.

param.name: ppvOut
param.para: On success, contains the address of a pointer to the object specified by riid.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Object implementers that want to enable the discovery of other objects that they can produce or that they hold should implement IObjectProvider.QueryObject and publish the GUID values that name those objects for clients of that object. Note that objects should not pass on the request for an object to other objects like QueryService.

summary.para: Exposes a method to discover objects that are named with a GUID from another object. Unlike QueryService this interface will not delegate its functionality on to other objects.

remarks.para: Similar to IServiceProvider, except that this method does not imply that unhandled or unknown requests should be forwarded.
